name: Brave Shepherd Boy
description:
The Brave Shepherd Boy is my 1st Unity game!

Made in 2010!

Its a Christian Themed 2D platformer where you play as a young shepherd that was approached Angels to find Baby Jesus the night he was born. 

Seeing the Angels spooked all of your sheep, so you have to find them all, then find Baby Jesus.

Controls: arrow keys to move / spacebar to jump / you can double jump / don't get eaten by wolves / you can jump on top of the wolves (mostly, there is some bad collision detection at times)
